channel.title: Jesus on humail khan
channel.description: Recent content in Jesus on humail khan

item.title: Implementing DNS SEC in AWS
item.description: Implementing DNSSEC using Route53 verify no DNS SEC is present run command on AWS CLI dig animlas4life.org dnskey +dnssec Set up DNS SEC Route53 > Hosted zones go inside animals4life.org DNSSEC signing > enable DNSSEC signing Create KSK Verify DNSSEC Keys run command on AWS CLI dig animlas4life.org dnskey +dnssec Get KSK signing algorithm & public key Route 53 > hosted zone > animlas4life.org > DNSSEC signing > view information to create DS record Create train of trust with TLD DNS > registered domains > DNSSEC Status this will modify the TLD of animals4lyfe domain zone by adding DS record this process might take a hour to complete.
